name: @guildedjs/guilded.js
description: A Node.js library for the Guilded.gg (https://www.guilded.gg/) API written in TypeScript, usable in either JavaScript or TypeScript projects.
author: zaid450 <nico.03727+github@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cd ../../ && npm run build && cd packages/guilded.js && node ./__tests__/index.js
scripts.test:local: npm run build && cd __tests__ && node index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npx rimraf dist/ && npx rimraf types/ && npm run build
